title: Making pottery. No. 1
creator_credit: Hartvig Jensen Film Productions and Harvig Jensen
brief_description: Shows how raw clay is processed in preparation for modelling. Demonstrations show a jug and a flower pot being made; creative use of engraving and decorating; the final firing and glazing processes.
creator_credit_for_label: Hartvig Jensen Film Productions and Harvig Jensen
